resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105327</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105327</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206166</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">NASA Oceanography</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die NASA Ozeanographie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Océanographie de la NASA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oceanography da NASA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oceanografia della NASA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ωκεανογραφία της NASA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oceanografía de la NASA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides online field trips, information about ocean phenomena (such as phytoplankton, carbon, and reefs), remote sensing tools for monitoring ocean changes, and more. This website is based on NASA research and satellite missions focused on global ocean science.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt auffangen online Reisen, 
Informationen über Ozeanphänomene (wie Phytoplankton, Carbon und 
Reefs), Fernabfragunghilfsmittel für die Überwachung der 
Ozeanänderungen und mehr zur Verfügung. Diese Web site basiert
auf die NASA Forschung und Satellitden missionen, die auf globale 
Ozeanwissenschaft gerichtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des voyages de zone en ligne, des 
informations sur des phénomènes d'océan (tels que le phytoplancton,
le carbone, et les récifs), des outils de télédétection pour 
surveiller des changements d'océan, et plus. Ce site Web est 
basé sur des missions de recherches et de satellite de la NASA 
concentrées sur la science globale d'océan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece desengates de campo em linha, informação
sobre fenômenos do oceano (tais como o phytoplankton, o carbono, e os
recifes), ferramentas detetar remoto para monitorar mudanças do 
oceano, e mais. Este Web site é baseado nas missões da 
pesquisa e do satélite da NASA focalizadas na ciência global do 
oceano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce i viaggi di campo in linea, le 
informazioni sui fenomeni dell'oceano (quali il fitoplancton, il 
carbonio ed i reefs), gli strumenti di telerilevamento per il 
controllo dei cambiamenti dell'oceano e più. Questo Web site è
basato sulle missioni di ricerca e del satellite della NASA messe a 
fuoco sulla scienza globale dell'oceano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τα σε απευθείας σύνδεση ταξίδια πεδίων, τις 
πληροφορίες για τα ωκεάνια φαινόμενα (όπως το φυτοπλαγκτόν, ο 
άνθρακας, και οι σκόπελοι), τα εργαλεία τηλεπισκόπησης για τις 
ωκεάνιες αλλαγές, και περισσότερων. Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος 
είναι βασισμένος στην έρευνα της NASA και οι δορυφορικές 
αποστολές εστίασαν στη σφαιρική ωκεάνια επιστήμη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a disparos al campo en línea, a la 
información sobre fenómenos del océano (tales como phytoplankton, 
carbón, y filones), a las herramientas de la detección alejada para 
vigilar cambios del océano, y más. Este Web site se basa en 
las misiones de la investigación y del satélite de la NASA centradas
en ciencia global del océano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206166</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105327</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/nasa-oceanography</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
